description:
What Makes it Great

The Cotswold Way is a 150 km / 95 mi trail through the beautiful Cotswolds region of England.

The walk can be done as a through-hike or as a series of day-hikes. There are also lots of loop options along the trail. B&Bs are readily available and you are rarely far from a nice pub.

Typically done over 7 or 8 days and follows good-quality paths with a nice mix of terrain.

Characteristics

This is a hike-only trail, though it would be easy to follow along on nearby roads the entire way. It is easy-to-moderate in difficulty and is well-signposted. The trail is well maintained with good footing. It is mostly off-road, passing through fields and open terrain. There are many beautiful villages along the way and lots of listed buildings, ruins, castles, and great viewpoints. It is a north-south trail that can be done in either direction.

What's Included in this Dataset

This trail dataset is under active development. Under our usual classification system, we consider it a Level 3 In Progress Dataset. It currently includes:

  • GPS tracks showing the full main trail. There are lots of great side trails and loops available along the way which we'll gradually be adding to this dataset.
  • Walking directions with distance markers for some of the sections. For other sections, they are still being entered – they should be available soon.
  • Descriptions of most attractions, including ruins, castles, listed buildings, and so on. There are lots more listed buildings to add, though.
  • Many geo-located points of interest, including waypoints with clear, useful notes. We'll be rapidly expanding the number of waypoints over the coming weeks.
  • Descriptions of each trail section.
  • Geo-located accommodations. We're only just starting to add these, but expect the listing to grow steadily. We have a huge number of B&Bs, hotels, etc. in our notes that we'll be adding.
  • Links to handy online resources for learning more about the trail.

We'll eventually add F & B options as well, though that isn't as high a priority for now. If you have suggestions about anything else we should include, let us know.
author: The Trekopedia Team
keywords: Hike, Moderate Difficulty, Field / Rural, Day Trip Options, Long-Distance, Signposted, Accommodation Available
name: Cotswold Way
